alert.note: Alert for Blount; Loudon; Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:02PM CDT until July 29 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Southern Blount County in east Tennessee... Central Monroe County in east Tennessee... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 402 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Madisonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maryville, Madisonville, Vonore, Greenback, Friendsville, Fort Loudon State Park, Tariffville, McGee Carson Peninsula, Happy Valley and Citico Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
